title: The Catcher in the Rye
desc: A story of teenage rebellion, alienation, and existential confusion. The novel follows Holden Caulfield as he reflects on his life and struggles with the transition from adolescence to adulthood.
author: J.D. Salinger

desc: A dystopian novel by George Orwell that explores the dangers of totalitarianism. It takes place in a society ruled by a figurehead known as Big Brother, where personal freedom is obliterated.
author: George Orwell
